notes.text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes the following issues:

Firefox Extended Support Release 115.9.1esr ESR MFSA 2024-16 (bsc#1221850)

- CVE-2024-29944: Privileged JavaScript Execution via Event Handlers (bmo#1886852).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An attacker was able to inject an event handler into a privileged object that would allow arbitrary JavaScript execution in the parent process. Note: This vulnerability affects Desktop Firefox only, it does not affect mobile versions of Firefox. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124.0.1 and Firefox ESR < 115.9.1.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
